::Triggerhappy/Skullgrin/Cutthroat::

      Triggerhappy landed by the CF, =
where the Stunticons were.  Skullgrin and Blowpipe hopped out, then Trigger=
happy transformed to robot mode.  Blowpipe reverted into Triggerhappy's com=
pressed air cannon.  Skullgrin and Triggerhappy smiled.

        "Time to s=
lag some Autobots!" Skullgrin said.

         Skullgrin transformed to his =
shrapnel-blasting assault tank mode, and fired 2 blasts up at Lavatron.  Tr=
iggerhappy did fancy little movements with his cannon around his wrist and =
stuff, then took hold of it and fired 3 shots at the CF.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
          Cutthroat transformed to creature mode =
and flew out of the way of the grenades.  Then, he flapped his wings hard t=
o hover, and opened his beak and out came a stream of fire, heading for the=
 Slasys/Supernova/Scrap jet.
